about_the_game:
◆Story


Cyclops, the city of eyes, was an ancient city with thousands of years of history, and it was also a pioneer in the transformation of the industrial revolution. On this stage, where history and technology intertwined, the stories of countless characters rose and fell in the noise and silence.

Dr. Etsu wasn't a star of the show or in the limelight, but his role was more dramatic than anyone else's. When he left academia in a state of despair, he was approached by a mysterious woman who called herself a "god" and gave him a pair of eyes with special powers. Years later, relying on the magic of his eyes and his solid medical skills, he became one of the most successful doctors in the city.



However, perhaps as his price to pay, every night in his dreams, Etsu always found himself in a room without a door, waiting for his patient: the mysterious maiden, Angus.

Angus suffered from an unknown, chronic illness, and no amount of medical expertise could relieve her of her pain, but she still welcomed Etsu's visits with a smile every day. Night after night, the two of them made diagnoses and talked to each other, where Angus learnt about the outside world from Etsu, and Etsu found solace in his contact with the young girl.



In order to find a cure for Angus, Etsu followed the guidance in his dreams and leaped into the various stories of the city of Cyclops. The old hero of the old town, the homeless girl of the deserted metal district, the detective on the train, the scholar of the university city… As key supporting characters on this stage, what changes would Etsu bring to their scripts?

Open your eyes; the show is about to begin.

◆Gameplay


The main storyline will consist of four areas in the city of Cyclops. As the story progresses, areas will be opened up for exploration, and you will be able to interact with the characters in the areas and make choices that will affect their stories.
The choices you make will affect Angus’ health and the final ending.
Use your eyes’ ability to see into the human body and beyond, into past scenes to learn more about the stories and find clues.
Enter the dream world during the nighttime, and interact with Angus by chatting with and diagnosing her.

◆Game Features


◇ Drama-themed exploration game, exploring four areas of the city at different times
◇ 17 basic CGs, including more than 100 differentials and 3 motion CGs
◇ Wordcount: 110,000
◇ One main female character, one secondary female character, and many female side characters (Mainly a one-on-one, loyal love story)
◇ Game ending: Three types

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or sexual acts , extreme violence, sexual assault , non-consensual sex, drug abuse, self-harm, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

name: The city of eyes and the girl in dreamland

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy The city of eyes and the girl in dreamland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In the thriving industrial, city of Cyclops, the quacksalver "Etsu" had earned a great reputation for his superb medical skills. However, behind his talent and achievements were two unknown secrets: one was eyes with a special power endowed by an existence mysterious to Etsu; the other was a girl who suffered from illnesses,...
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, German, Russian, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
